TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 334
TEI.2.document_title: James Cox, Jr. to James Bryan, 12-12-1818

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 334

div1.p: Receivd. Herculaneum Decr 12th 1818 of James Bryan by Elias Bates Twenty Thousand One Hundred pounds of Shott at Eight Dollars pr Hundred and Seventeen Thousand pounds of Small barr lead at Six Dollars and fifty Cents pr Hundred for which I have signed Duplicates—the shott English wt. the lb barr French Wt.
[Endorsed:] James Cox Junr Receipt for Shott and Lead
